metadata.title: Benthic Invertebrate Literature on the Bering Sea and Chukchi Sea Ecosystem Database

creators.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Biological Resources Division, Alaska Science Center (ASC)

metadata.description: Database of literature from Benthic invertebrate field research in the Bering Sea and Chukchi Sea.  Citations are indexed by geographical area, sampling methods, taxa, sampling cruise and year. Where applicable, citations are cross-referenced by similar data sources, author and National Oceanographic Data Center track number. This Database complements the Bering and Chukchi Sea Benthic Invertebrate database.
metadata.notes:
